version_description:
- We hope you enjoy playing BlockuDoku! Relax and solve blocks puzzle!
- Performance and stability improvements, spend your time with more pleasure!

- We hope you enjoy playing BlockuDoku! Relax and solve blocks puzzle!
- Performance and stability improvements, spend your time with more pleasure!

- Performance and stability improvements.

We hope you enjoy playing BlockuDoku. We read all your reviews carefully to make the game even better for you. Please leave us some feedback why you love this game and what you'd like to improve. Keep your mind active with BlockuDoku!

- Performance and stability improvements.

We hope you enjoy playing BlockuDoku. We read all your reviews carefully to make the game even better for you. Please leave us some feedback why you love this game and what you'd like to improve. Keep your mind active with BlockuDoku!

- iPad support – play BlockuDoku on a big screen
- New languages – Polish, Thai, Vietnamese, Arabic and Chinese Traditional
- Haptic feedback for iPhone 7 and newer models
- More convenient way to communicate with our support team via Zendesk
- Option to remove ads and enjoy playing BlockuDoku ad-free.
